snippet.title: Steel Seed - Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the latest Steel Seed trailer. Steel Seed is a stealth action-adventure game set in a dark, sci-fi world where humanity hangs on the brink of extinction. Join protagonist Zoe and her flying drone, KOBY, as they investigate the depths of a hostile underground facility in search of answers and the key to the survival of mankind.

Steel Seed is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #SteelSeed
